amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to increase funding for clinical trials at NIH and ban the use of spread pricing by PBMs as it relates to Medicaid.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to increase funding for clinical trials at NIH and ban the use of spread pricing by PBMs as it relates to Medicaid.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Houlahan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
